guide.title: Gentoo Core Documentation Subproject
guide.subtitle: Main Page
guide.abstract: The Gentoo Core Documentation Subproject is a project devoted to the complete and concise core documentation of the Gentoo Project.

body.p: The Gentoo Core Documentation Subproject features the documentation used by our users to install a complete working Gentoo system.

On this page you will find a listing of the documents featured by this subproject, and the maintainer of the document. This maintainer is not the only one who can edit the document, on the contrary. Every person of the team should be able to edit the document. However, the reason of this maintainership is to have at least one person we know that we can address with problems concerning the document if no one else is volunteering.
